code_events.event: Internal use for adding Copyrights in the footer.

Allows to deifne JS dependencies via easy Array Config..

This only listens to the dev and prod arguments in the xf:js Tag.

If you use this for your own development, the AddOn cv6/Core needs to be installed!

Callback signature:

array &$dependencies

Arguments:

  1. Array &$dependencies - Array JS Files and the dependency.

Example:

 public static function getJsDependencys(&$dependencies)
{
	$dependencies[] = [
    	'my/AddOn' => [
			'my/AddOn/sample.js' => [
            	['dev' => 'xf/form.js', 'prod' => 'xf/form.min.js']
            ]
        ]
    ];
}
